content: Step 1: Go to the website of the gmail service provider and click on the Create an account button.
Step 2: Fill in the required information to register a new account, such as your name, desired email address, and password. Hints: To choose a strong and secure password to protect your account.
Step 3: Sign up with a mobile phone number.
Step 4: Log in to your new email account using your email address and password.
Step 5: Set up your email account preferences and customise your profile by adding your name, profile picture, and other personal details.
Step 6: Add contacts to your email address book and start sending and receiving emails. You can compose a new email, attach files, and format the text using the email service providerâ€™s features.
Step 7: To ensure the security of your account, please change your password regularly.
